text: Bondville is an unincorporated village in the town of Winhall, Bennington County, Vermont, United States. The community is located along Vermont Route 30, east of the village of Manchester. Bondville has a post office with ZIP code 05340, which opened on May 23, 1850. Bondville also hosts the smallest and oldest consecutive running fair in Vermont. The first year dating back to 1797. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Bennington County, Vermont Category:Unincorporated communities in Vermont
title: Bondville, Vermont
